src_original: KP.13 catvāra ime kāśyapa bodhisattvasya kumitrāṇi kusahāyāste bodhisattvena parivarjayitavyā /
tgt_original: 欲脫眾生苦，　　不欲自身樂。 此四種真實菩薩，應當覺知。

src_original: ye śrāvakā ātmahitāya yuktā yogaṃ ca ye pravrajitāścaranti /
tgt_original: 亦為成熟眾，　　捨離於自事。

src_original: ete kumitrā kusahāyayuktā jinena dūrāt parivarjanīyā / 3 //
tgt_original: 親近善知識，　　所謂法師佛， 勸勵出家者，　　及以乞求輩。

src_original: KP.14 catvāra ime kāśyapa bodhisattvasya bhūtakalyāṇamitrāṇi /
tgt_original: 此四種菩薩善知識，應當親近。

src_original: yācanako bodhisattvasya bhūtakalyāṇamitraṃ bodhimārgopastambhāya saṃvartate dharmabhāṇako bodhisattvasya bhūtakalyāṇamitraṃ śrutaprajñopastambhāya saṃvartate /
tgt_original: 所謂法師是菩薩善知識，為助持聞慧故。 佛世尊是菩薩善知識，為助持諸佛法故。
勸出家者是菩薩善知識，為助持諸善根故。

src_original: saṃvartate /  buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvasya bhūtakalyāṇamitra sarvabuddhadharmopastambhāya saṃvartate /
tgt_original: 乞求者是菩薩善知識，為助持菩提心故。
此四種菩薩善知識，應當親近。

src_original: ete hi catvāri jinapraśastā kalyāṇamitrā sugatātmajānāṃ /
tgt_original: 此四種菩薩惡知識，應當知之。
